metadata.title: CVE-2018-3058 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:MyISAM). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.60 and prior, 5.6.40and prior and 5.7.22 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows lowprivileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols tocompromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of MySQLServer accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.3 (Integrity impacts). CVSSVector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-3058` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-common - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1

No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.23-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mariadb-10.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-server-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
